content: I think the 50/30/20 rule sounds like a great starting point. I've never really thought about allocating my income that way before. But I do have a question, how do I determine what counts as a necessity versus a want? For instance, I've been buying my daily essentials like toothpaste and shampoo from Aldi instead of more expensive brands, but then I went and splurged on that Drunk Elephant skincare set. Was that a need or a want?
